sentences.en: a breezy and relaxed air of confidence
It was a bright, breezy day.

sentences.cn: 莫娜竭力使自己的声音听上去轻松随意。

sentences.en: She tried to sound breezy on the phone.
sentences.cn: 她尽量使自己的语气在电话里听起来轻松愉快.

sentences.en: She was a bright and breezy sort of girl, always laughing.

sentences.en: The weather at the seaside was ideal — bright and breezy.

sentences.cn: 她们活泼开朗的性格是坚强可爱的.

sentences.cn: 这张专辑音乐轻松明快，趣味十足。

sentences.en: This is somewhat different from the atmosphere which prevailed in Philadelphia -- more breezy and generous.

sentences.en: We'll expect you back tomorrow, bright and breezy.

sentences.en: What a breezy testament to the pleasure of romance!

sentences.en: Young's breezy, disarming style proved central in the transition from white to black Detroit.
sentences.cn: 杨轻松愉快, 和蔼可亲的风度在底特律从白到黑的转变中起了核心作用.
